TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MeetingRequest extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.MeetingMessage

summary.span: Representa una convocatoria de reunión que un asistente puede aceptar o rechazar.

span.span: Represents a meeting request that an attendee can accept or decline.

summary.span: Propiedades que están disponibles en las convocatorias de reunión se definen en la clase MeetingRequestSchema.

span.span: Properties that are available on meeting requests are defined in the MeetingRequestSchema class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults Accept(bool sendResponse) cil managed
Public Function Accept (sendResponse As Boolean) As CalendarActionResults

param.name: sendResponse
param.span: true para enviar una respuesta al organizador; en caso contrario, false.

span.span: true to send a response to the organizer; otherwise, false.

summary.span: Acepta la reunión.

span.span: Accepts the meeting.

summary.span: Llamar a este método se genera en una llamada al servicio Web de Exchange (EWS).

span.span: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Service (EWS).
A CalendarActionResults object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults AcceptTentatively(bool sendResponse) cil managed
Public Function AcceptTentatively (sendResponse As Boolean) As CalendarActionResults

param.name: sendResponse
param.span: true para enviar una respuesta al organizador; en caso contrario, false.

span.span: true to send a response to the organizer; otherwise, false.

summary.span: Acepta provisionalmente la reunión.

span.span: Tentatively accepts the meeting.

summary.span: Llamar a este método se genera en una llamada al servicio Web de Exchange (EWS).

span.span: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Service (EWS).
A CalendarActionResults object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdjacentMeetingCount As Integer
public: property int AdjacentMeetingCount { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el número de entradas de calendario que están junto a la cita en el calendario del usuario autenticado.

span.span: Gets the number of calendar entries that are adjacent to the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.

value.span: El número de entradas de calendario que están junto a la cita en el calendario del usuario autenticado.

span.span: The number of calendar entries that are adjacent to the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllowNewTimeProposal As Boolean
public: property bool AllowNewTimeProposal { bool get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si los asistentes pueden proponer una nueva hora para la reunión.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether attendees can propose a new time for the meeting.

value.span: true si los asistentes pueden proponer una nueva hora para la reunión; en caso contrario, false.

span.span: true if attendees can propose a new time for the meeting; otherwise, false.

public: property DateTime AppointmentReplyTime { DateTime get(); };

span.span: Gets the time when the attendee replied to the meeting request.

value.span: La hora cuando el asistente se respondió a la convocatoria de reunión.

span.span: The time when the attendee replied to the meeting request.

span.span: Gets the sequence number of the appointment.

value.span: El número de secuencia de la cita.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentState As Integer
public: property int AppointmentState { int get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.MeetingRequest Bind(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeService service, class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ItemId id) cil managed
Public Shared Function Bind (service As ExchangeService, id As ItemId) As MeetingRequest

param.name: service
param.span: Servicio que se va a usar para enlazar a la convocatoria de reunión.

span.span: The service to use to bind to the meeting request.

param.name: id
param.span: El identificador de la convocatoria de reunión a la que enlazar.

span.span: The identifier of the meeting request to bind to.

summary.span: Se enlaza a una convocatoria de reunión existente y carga de sus propiedades de primera clases.

span.span: Binds to an existing meeting request and loads its first class properties.

summary.span: Llamar a este método se genera en una llamada a servicios Web de Exchange (EWS).

span.span: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

returns.span: Una instancia de la clase MeetingRequest que representa la convocatoria de reunión que se corresponde con el identificador especificado.

span.span: An instance of the MeetingRequest class that represents the meeting request that corresponds to the specified identifier.

exception.span: Para obtener información detallada sobre esta excepción, consulte .

span.span: For details about this exception, see .

span.span: The highlighted changes to a meeting request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.AcceptMeetingInvitationMessage CreateAcceptMessage(bool tentative) cil managed
Public Function CreateAcceptMessage (tentative As Boolean) As AcceptMeetingInvitationMessage

param.name: tentative
param.span: true para aceptar provisionalmente la reunión; en caso contrario, false.

span.span: true to tentatively accept the meeting; otherwise, false.

summary.span: Crea una variable local aceptación que se puede personalizar y envía el mensaje de reunión.

span.span: Creates a local meeting acceptance message that can be customized and sent.

returns.span: Una instancia de la AcceptMeetingInvitationMessage que representa la reunión mensaje de aceptación.

span.span: An instance of the AcceptMeetingInvitationMessage that represents the meeting acceptance message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property When As String
public: property System::String ^ When { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene un valor de texto que indica cuándo se produce la cita.

span.span: Gets a text value that indicates when the appointment occurs.

summary.span: El valor de texto se localiza mediante el uso de la referencia cultural de Exchange Server o mediante el uso de la referencia cultural especificada en la propiedad PreferredCulture del objeto ExchangeService que depende de la cita.

span.span: The text value is localized by using the Exchange Server culture or by using the culture specified in the PreferredCulture property of the ExchangeService object that the appointment is bound to.

value.span: Un valor de texto que indica cuándo se produce la cita.

span.span: A text value that indicates when the appointment occurs.
